website_summaries.verdict: A sound medical alert system with no monthly fees and an affordable price. The best choice if you are watching your budget.
pros: Portable pendant pairs with digital answering system
Combines large buttons, vivid display, and two speed dial keys for easy access
cons: Range isn't as long as some pricier models
Handset volume may not be loud enough for hard-of-hearing users

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! No monthly fee and gives your loved one and you security and peace of mind!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my grandmother and we all love it. This gives us peace of mind knowing she can contact us or emergency personnel at the press of a button. The portable pendant is too big to wear around a neck, but we tied it to her walker and she can walk around her home with security knowing she can contact us at anytime. She can also answer incoming phone calls and know who is calling with the voice caller ID with the portable pendant. Also, there is no monthly fee. Just purchase the product, set it up, and you are ready to use. Don't waste your money with lifeline or any other service that charges you!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient & could be life saving
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this for anyone hard of hearing that has a hard time dialing a phone. I got this for my mother in law because she was getting harassed by telemarketers. She also had twisted fingers and it was difficult for her to dial for help if she needed it. We programmed my husbands cel & 911 for her plus she could answer the phone with the touch of a button if she recognized the person calling easily. So grateful for this product & no monthly fees either. I loved it so much that I sent it to my mom after she passed away.
customer_reviews.author: I know what I like

customer_reviews.title: I though these would be great because my husband has a hard time hearing but ...
customer_reviews.text: The person on the other end has a hard time hearing you unless you are the speaker phone. They say that they hear echoing and can't make out what you're saying on the regular phones. I though these would be great because my husband has a hard time hearing but when you use them as a regular phone, the person you are talking to can't hear you and I also hear the echoing. Not really crazy about this phone for the reason. Great if you don't mind everyone hearing your conversation and picking all the background noise up.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Bell

customer_reviews.title: can't call out
customer_reviews.text: can't call out. Bought in Aug for my 90+ FIL and his companion. It seemed to work OK but now it Nov they can't call out. Unfortunately I don't live nearby but friends have looked at it but no good. It is connected to one of those Verizon cellular boxes. Had to replace it last week. Very disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: A great tool to keep seniors independent
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product they thought of everything with this phone. Easy to use easy to set up. I really like the small pennant you can wear around your neck and just press one button to dial for help. It's a great tool to help seniors keep their independence. They don't have to remember phone numbers just press button number one or number 2 and call the preset numbers a family member has programmed into the phone. To answer a call all they have to do is press one big button on the pennant once and talk hands-free
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome; perfect for my grandma! She's 85 with dementia and is getting the hang of the button phone thingy. They thought of everything with this set! Use the button thing to answer incoming calls or use the one touch buttons on the back of it to reach emergency contacts. It has its own volume settings and charger base too. Use as an alert necklace or clip on
customer_reviews.author: DeaR

customer_reviews.title: Works great for someone living alone and doesnt want to pay ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the pendant. Works great for someone living alone and doesnt want to pay for a Life Alert monitoring system. The pendant can be worn around the neck or I put it as a bracelet. You program in who you want it to call and once programmed you only need to push 1 button. The Vetech phone works great too. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind Telephone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for those who have family members to worry about. The phone is simple to use and the dials are easy to read. Holds a charge well. The pendant is great while traveling through the house. It made me feel better about my Mother's access in case of a fall or even the simplicity of having the phone to answer near her at all times. There is also a 911 availability on the pendant....I like that.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Elderly!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my elderly mother and it is perfect! We don't want a subscription service. The pendant has 2 buttons to program 1 family member and 911. It also has speaker phone and can be used to answer calls. I wish more companies made similar devices and it appears Vtech is discontinuing this, which is very disappointing. The battery on pendant is not replaceable and our is going after 2 years, so we just bought 2 more pendants which were only available on auction site.
customer_reviews.author: Cats Cuddles

customer_reviews.title: I really LOVE this phone
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE this phone!!! Last year (December) I purchased another phone (SIMILAR to this phone) PAID MORE for the OTHER phone and the other phone "died-out" within 7 months!!! That phone was a piece of junk!!!!! This phone has more features and "speaks" the name of each caller...the other phone did not do this. I recommend THIS phone highly!
customer_reviews.author: F. K. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Senior Citizens!
customer_reviews.text: Several years ago we decided to go "cell phone only" in our home, but needed a land line once an elderly parent moved in with us. This phone is a blessing! The caller id announcement is very clear and helpful, especially if eyesight is challenged. The pendant feature is wonderful, also has caller id announcement and can tell you date, day and time if you ask! Mom was always asking, now she just asks the pendant! Mom can be in any room and answer the phone! Set up was fast and easy. The price is great. Do not hesitate to purchase this phone! 5 stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: PeachyQueen

customer_reviews.title: This is a popular item at my Mother's assisted living ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a popular item at my Mother's assisted living facility. It is inexpensive and works well. The technology is sophisticated, yet simple enough for my (stroke afflicted) Mom to operate. The pendant phone is the real plus, as it allows Mom to answer calls anywhere in the building or call us whenever she needs to with a push of a single button.
customer_reviews.author: Craig D. Newhouse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for folks who can't use a regular phone.
customer_reviews.text: Used for a handicapped senior who can't use a regular phone at all. You just push the "1" or "2" button and it calls whichever number is programmed for that button. To pick up the phone, you just push the phone icon button. The speaker and microphone are right in the pendant. She wears it all day and charges it at night.
customer_reviews.author: Eisele family

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: This CareLine cordless telephone in general works well. Two, three drawbacks that I observed are the placement of the volume control on the handset. A person winds up moving the volume up and down when handling the handset. The other drawback is the due to the very shallow receiver cradle on base. One has to be sure that the receiver is firmly seated and I don't think it disconnects calls when the receiver is placed on the charging cradle like other cordless phones. At least mine does not.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have this phone for about a year and, in my opinion, it is great. It has a pendant which can be hung around your neck or clipped to something for someone who is handicapped and needs to call a family member or 911 when there is an emergency There are no monthly fees and it has Audio/Visual caller ID, which can be difficult to understand but gives you an idea who is calling when you are not close to the phone. The price is right too.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace the land line/answering machine we had that stopped working. This was economical but I wish it had another hand set instead of the pendant thingy. But it works. We receive calls. The answering machine works. The volume control is in an awkward position but it can be turned up loud enough to hear or down lower for persons who talk very loud over the line. I do like the voice announce the numbers I punch in.
customer_reviews.author: CleanOne

customer_reviews.title: ... see the numbers to call someone) this is a great phone. The "remote" has two buttons that can ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have an elderly parent or someone with a disability who may need help (whether because of a fall or if they struggle to see the numbers to call someone) this is a great phone. The "remote" has two buttons that can be programmed to call for help - whether you program in 911 or a neighbor or a family member to come help. Or, if they have trouble dialing and holding a phone - the remote works as a speakerphone and they can wear it around their neck if they like. Great phone if you can't afford Lifeline or other monthly subscription/monitored help lines.
customer_reviews.author: MMCritter

customer_reviews.title: Pendant is awesome but easily pushed
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up. Only took a few minutes once charged. The pendant has been a life changer for my disabled father. The fact that he can answer calls and talk through it with a push of the button has been awesome! I will agree with other reviewers that the speed dial button on the pendant is easily pushed. I only programmed it to call me so it hasn't been that big of an issue. I will not be programming the second button to call anyone else due to this fact.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Pocket phone give her piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, Mom in her 90 carries the little phone around in her pocket all day. If phone rings she can answer it or call me with one push of a button. Best thing is it tells her good morning when she takes it off charger and good night when she hangs it up. Other phone works like any other phone.
customer_reviews.author: PHudson

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for older people living alone!
customer_reviews.text: The features on this phone are second to none. Its backlit buttons, loud speaker, simple answering machine, and call announcements are just a few of the best. However, the function that makes this phone AMAZING is the pendant that allows the caller to select two emergency numbers to call in case they are in distress. It's a godsend for families that worry that a loved one might fall or need assistance but not be able to get to a phone. I wish I would have bought it earlier....
customer_reviews.author: Kdodd

customer_reviews.title: Grandma likes it.
customer_reviews.text: The display is easy to read and the audible called id is good, though a little hard for older folks to understand at first. The separate pendant is great for when you are outside and want to answer the phone. The only feature it needs that the handset does not have is one button speed dial from the keypad. You have to look in the directory on the phone and choose the person to call, instead of pushing a button. Yes the pendant has one button speed dial, but for only 2 numbers.
customer_reviews.author: jfansc

customer_reviews.title: A phone in every home...gift it too.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I just wish connection to ear buds, blue tooth and/or mobile were options available too. Senior gift is a must... inside/outside (garage garden) check range first... New mothers...bathing or changing babies. keep it away from water. (put in ziploc bag!) Upgrade this phone...
customer_reviews.author: Guijahmoon44

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom because she's in her 70's and I always worry when I call and she doesn't pick up. I Love it and so does she. She wears it around her neck and never missed calls anymore. It also has a really good range even when she's in the yard or in her porch. It also announced who's calling by name. It says "call from Belle". It's easy to operate I'm very happy with it. The stress of her not answering my call is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Belkis Hoyos

customer_reviews.title: This is a great choice for any one who needs constant monitoring
customer_reviews.text: This is a great choice for any one who needs constant monitoring. Very simple to use and has good range. My 93 yr old Dad has been able to work this reasonably well. That is saying a lot under the circumstances. Only trouble is he accidentally dials us quite a bit, but that is better than not having contact when needed. Very good value in our opinion.
customer_reviews.author: samshark

customer_reviews.title: Good product! it s took me a while to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product! it s took me a while to figure out how to use all the 'extras' (caller ID, phone book, deleting missed calls, etc) as I m not a techie. Can't remember what I paid for it (37.99 on sale now) but knowing me it was a bargain & then some as I ve had it for 2 or 3 yrs. Love the little pendant - programmed it & use it beside my bed so if I need help during night I can press button for 911 or my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: niksmema

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design
customer_reviews.text: Worst phone ever. Terrible design. Impossible to pick it up without hitting the ring button on the right side of it. Will return if I can, but can’t find out how yet. Replaced it with another make and model.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Serves s purpose!
customer_reviews.text: Ok directions very difficult -no test on the phone to see if you did it right! Had to call 911. Which is s big deal! ...needs better directions!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bruce

customer_reviews.title: A real lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my elderly father after he was no longer able to use a regular phone. He keeps the pendant with him at all times. Having the ability to easily call a family member when needed really helps him feel more confident and secure.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with another unit with same model number
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a set identical to this one a couple of years back. The pendant stopped working so we purchased this one that was the same model number hoping that the pendant could replace the old one. It did not work. Everything is still in the box up in the closet. I've tried everything I can to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Sabra Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless phone a nice to have the pendant
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandmother. She likes the phone and we like that she can carry the pendant around. She was carrying another phone around before, so this is a nice change. She's had issues with call quality, but that's most likely due to the old phone lines in her house. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone for seniors.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for mom she love it especially that device you wear around your neck. You can program to numbers on device for emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: CareLine Button thing is amazing. I have nothing but good stories
customer_reviews.text: CareLine Button thing is amazing. I have nothing but good stories... The only complaint. It sometimes can't understand the voice commands. If someone older speaks a little slower.
customer_reviews.author: Poodle Paw YouTube

customer_reviews.title: I am thrilled with this phone set. The pendant ...
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this phone set. The pendant is a life saver for my father who can wear it around his neck and call for help if he needs it. My father is handicapped and has very limited mobility. Before he was constantly misplacing the handset for the phone and missing phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Erwin

customer_reviews.title: The description of the product.
customer_reviews.text: The plane was very well made. Detailed was very accurate. My husband liked it and has started a small collection of these planes. We look forward to seeing more of these planes. Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: jasper

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Returned this due to pendant not working. Pendant couldn't be replaced since they stopped making them
customer_reviews.author: michael smith

customer_reviews.title: Extensions differ and cannot be adjusted easily.
customer_reviews.text: This does not work particularly well with Ooma, words are slurred, people can't be heard, many problems. They work OK, though, and when one broke the company gave me another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Don't pay for expensive monthly monitoring services...
customer_reviews.text: ...get this instead. Seriously. I got this for my grandmother. She has had it for over a year, and wears the pendant every day. I programmed in my aunt's phone number as well as the number of the local emergency services. Only drawback so far is that the functionality of the pendant is somewhat limited (can only program in two phone numbers).
customer_reviews.author: NBJ

customer_reviews.title: Can be a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my aunt who lives by herself and is not too steady on her feet. Plugged it in and had it working in minutes with 2 phone numbers programmed in the pendant. Has 2 large buttons on the pendant for easy use. She has used it several times when she needed help but can also be used for making regular calls to numbers programmed in pendant . She is on a limited income so we wanted something that had no monthly fees. This one worked great with no extra fees to worry about. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: We previously bought this for our main home and like it so much that we got another one for ...
customer_reviews.text: We previously bought this for our main home and like it so much that we got another one for our city apartment. It does the job without subscribing to a for-pay service. We have button 1 set to my cell number, and button 2 to our daughter. My wife has dementia so I remind her each time to press 1 if she needs to reach me, and I'm never away for long. It would be a bad idea to have a button set to 911. She has accidentally called me or our daughter several times .and it would have been very bad if she had reached 911 and not spoken to them.
customer_reviews.author: arnold braff

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for 911 caller
customer_reviews.text: Great combo for disabled person and no extra expense for fixed income people
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Jennings

customer_reviews.title: We really like the accessory that enables her to dial one of ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my mother. We really like the accessory that enables her to dial one of us if she falls or having a medical problem. There is no monthly fee with this option.
customer_reviews.author: jan kesler

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This phone works PERFECTLY for my physically disabled husband. He is able to push the button the the pendant unit around his neck and can hear and be heard very well. We are very pleased with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for for our parents who still had a landline and were limited on dialing. They really didn’t need a phone that alerted authorities, because we lived next door. One of the most useful purchases me made for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase! I bought this phone for the alert button. The phone will not take a charge. Its useless. I am returning it
customer_reviews.author: Joni Munch

customer_reviews.title: Batteries in handset and pendant both dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Batteries in handset and pendant both dead on arrival and would not take a charge no matter how long they were on the base. Bought new and replaced handset battery so its now working but pendant is not a serviceable battery so its junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Work Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for parents to throw away their old crappie ones!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Would by again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother with no monthly fees. She keeps phone in her living room and pendent by her bed at night. So far this works great
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The portable pendant allows you to call up to two numbers and you can answer phone calls with the pendant. It has a loud volume speaker for the hard of hearing. Very impressed and a great product for the elderly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super phone for visually challenged
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time, in good condition and is as described by the seller.mthis is a good phone for people who are visually challenged. The large buttond are a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: jriorda

customer_reviews.title: Great for Elderly! can set up pictures for them to call!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my elderly Mother and setup was very easy! Setting up Pictures for her to call makes it much easier since she has problems dialing numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Mcjunkin Sales

customer_reviews.title: ... mother (97 years old) and seems to be a fine addition for her well being
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly mother (97 years old) and seems to be a fine addition for her well being. After a short amount of practice time, she has been able to use it proficiently. Thank goodness, she has not had to use the emergency feature yet and I hope she never has to, but it gives me peace of mind. I was just about to invest in a system that required a costly set up fee plus monthly charges when my daughter, who is a director at a Senior Center, recommended this one to me. She advises all of her seniors to get it.
customer_reviews.author: ELENE B. MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase for and elderly family member
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a senior friendly phone this is it! My 92 year old Father has difficulty using and hearing most everything but not this! The pendent is amazing, easy to use and he hears on it perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: JillStephen Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product for elderly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use in Singapore. Fortunately the power plug can be used in a 220V socket. The phone works very well I particularly like the pendant phone. Very easy to use by the elderly. Full marks!
customer_reviews.author: HF Lum

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for senior citizens because you don't have to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for senior citizens because you don't have to pay a monthly fee in order to have a lifeline. I had to return it because the building I live in has provided a monitoring system for free. I highly recommend it however as it worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: Cassy

customer_reviews.title: My VTech CareLine, et. al.
customer_reviews.text: I now use this wonderful system and am amazed at the tone, volume, audio assist and pendant! Thank you so much. I brought the brochure to my audiologist. She was delighted.

customer_reviews.title: Base unit wireless transmitter subject to fail after ayear or two.
customer_reviews.text: I suggest getting a replacement warranty since the base unit wireless transmitter has an issue of going out after one or two years use. Manufacturer will replace under warranty but can be a hassle. I've had to replace twice already but pendants and handset can be re-programmed. This is the best economical version alternative without being locked into a commercial medical alert plan.
customer_reviews.author: JL Garner

customer_reviews.title: This phone is wonderful. My father-in-law has Parkinson's Disease and has very ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is wonderful. My father-in-law has Parkinson's Disease and has very little finger dexterity and is unable to use the phone. This pendant phone is perfect. He pushes one button to call pre-programmed number and another button to answer. It has given him a bit of independence.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Reid

customer_reviews.title: I gave 5 stars because the product did everything it ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5 stars because the product did everything it was advertized to do, but my mother still will not wear the pendant! Go figure! Maybe the pendant is a bit heavier than the one from the expensive "pay monthly" company that we were trying to replace!
customer_reviews.author: cathy timbs

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered by expected date. The phone once set up works well and the pendent is a great idea, I would like to see a emergency 911 button on the pendent along with the 2 phone numbers though.
customer_reviews.author: Badgen21

customer_reviews.title: life saving phone
customer_reviews.text: The vtech phone is my life line when I need help. I fell while outside my home and was so thankful for the small pendant around my neck. I was able to push the 911 button for help. The phone is nice and answering machine keeps up with my calls. No Monthly charges for having this security. I ordered one for my older sister as they are so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: I works wonderfully AND NO monthly fees
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this as a "help I've fallen" device. My husband was in the hospital and I didn't feel as secure alone. I works wonderfully AND NO monthly fees. Connects to 911 and my son's number. I connected it to my existing Panasonic system and it works perfect
customer_reviews.author: sg

customer_reviews.title: We both love to carry the pendant around with us
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my sister, who is handicapped and one for myself. We both love to carry the pendant around with us. It is a great item. Would purchase it again. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: quietspirit

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice!
customer_reviews.text: ...Peffect ...Hang around your neck and just talk. ...Super Nice! ...Does what it says it does. I use it Everyday and sometime talk for hours ...Outstanding Product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Capps

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for Mom
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my eldery mom, and she finds it easy to use. The pendent feature is a very cool idea.
customer_reviews.author: Shortwaver

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Pendant and headset were already paired and when I ordered two additional headsets were incredible fast and easy to pair.
customer_reviews.author: Azure4569

customer_reviews.title: I bought this phone mostly for my elderly dad. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone mostly for my elderly dad. He particularly loves the pendant, and I do too. Now he has a one-touch button in case of emergencies wherever he goes in the house.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rosario

customer_reviews.title: pendant doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: order if you want a landline phone but the pendant doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: See above
customer_reviews.text: This phone system is ready to call your emergency parties with a touch of a button and also the convenience of answering all incoming calls and having a conversation through using necklace speaker system with no added monthly charges.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in many ways
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 93 year old mother who does not see or hear well. She especially loves the pendant, and in general she is hard to please. The verbal feedback from the phone when pushing buttons is especially nice.
customer_reviews.author: CACGH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: The best phone I have purchased in a long time. Uncomplicated setup with clear sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cool useful features, Speakerphone is loud and clear. Caller id, Too many features to list. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Has soooo many features.I would highly recommend for an older person.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: So glad we found this "necklace phone"
customer_reviews.text: So glad we found this "necklace phone", as we call it for my mother in law! So much easier for her to use vs. walking around looking for a ringing phone!
customer_reviews.author: S. Copp

customer_reviews.title: One of the best bargains in all that Amazon has to offer!
customer_reviews.text: This combo is an amazing bargain! Amazing what all you can do with both the cordless phone and the pendant. I would HIGHLY recommend it to anyone looking to get a safety pendant for a loved one. A complete package for a one-time purchase, and NO monthly fee!
customer_reviews.author: Doo Wop Lover

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is IT! I was looking for something for my mom and this is great. It works like it says it should. Great product. Now, if she would only wear the pendant. I may have to have it stitched to her arm.
customer_reviews.author: Muzek4him

customer_reviews.title: A very good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. It functions very well. A very good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lyricalfrog

customer_reviews.title: Super product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and the pendant is the bomb
customer_reviews.author: Tony Smith

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a person with dimentia
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product very well. Unfortunately, my mom with moderate dimentia is still having trouble using it. Hoping in time she will remember how it works. I love the simplicity of it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C Maida

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother-in-law. Easy to set up, like the voice command ability, mom is learning to use more features daily. Like the pre-programed numbers, she can call us quickly. Don't care for the placement of the quick dial buttons, it's easy to lean on something and dial a number.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is great!!! I bought it for my 79yr old mother who lives alone after a fall. She loves it and gives her some security
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent features. Pendant buttons too easy to press accidentally
customer_reviews.text: Excellent features. Pendant buttons too easy to press accidentally. Hit 911 twice before removing that number. Still works well as a second extension I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone concept
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone concept, and definitely would recommend it to others. ALOT of great features. I purchased two handsets for them .
customer_reviews.author: Paula J. Winans

customer_reviews.title: phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly mother. it works wonderful. it's easy for her to use. only 3 buttons she push the "1" to call me "2" to call my brother the talk button a lows her to answer any income calls. She loves it. yes I would by it again
customer_reviews.author: milesa

customer_reviews.title: Works great as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is simple to use. Good way to avoid paying a monthly subscription with Lifeline.
customer_reviews.author: S. mullen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy
customer_reviews.text: Feature laden phone with emergency caller that you can take with you.
customer_reviews.author: joca

customer_reviews.title: Been nice had that been included with info on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Got phone today for my mom. The pendant not working (reason we ordered it). Read manual to trouble shoot. Then called vtech support only to find out they have discontinued this product. Been nice had that been included with info on Amazon. Thankfully I can send it back
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, thoughthe battery does run out too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: junglejude

customer_reviews.title: Its okay - but
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept. The caller voice is hard to understand and the phone is so light it is easy to drop or knock off the cradlle.
customer_reviews.author: Shady Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: Good Product So Far
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my elderly father in law. He seems to be pleased with its ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: RedElite

customer_reviews.title: Vtech phone and pendant.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase, sound for annoucing caller could be clearer. Now if I can only get the Wife to use the pendant!
customer_reviews.author: AJY

customer_reviews.title: Great for my mom who really can't dial phones anymore
customer_reviews.text: Great for my mom who really can't dial phones anymore. At least she can call me and talk to any callers easily
customer_reviews.author: CAROLINE EDDY

customer_reviews.title: Nice option for the elderly...
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest option I've found for my elderly parents. This unit does not require a subscription. Plenty of options to add to the system.
customer_reviews.author: mr.apex

customer_reviews.title: I like the larger screen and the voice announcement of caller ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the larger screen and the voice announcement of caller id. I only ordered the 1 set, but received 2 and need to return one of them but I don't have a return lable for the addtess.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Patterson

customer_reviews.title: not beneficial
customer_reviews.text: The caller ID voice (and other voice features) are very hard to understand, sound like gibberish!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very good speakerphone on the pendent and good range
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my grandmother whom is confined to a wheelchair and has issues with technology. She can answer the phone and use the two programmed numbers on the pendent to make some calls. Very good speakerphone on the pendent and good range.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Would like to return as pendant does not hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Wyss

customer_reviews.title: Very fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping at a great product price. Great product too.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: VTech with pendant
customer_reviews.text: Phone works ok but pendant won't hold a charge very long. Would not recommend for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: David Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It is easy for him to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my dad. He likes it. It is easy for him to use. He's 77 and gave it a thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer CINDY

customer_reviews.title: Happy to report this time the pendant and all other ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I ordered. Happy to report this time the pendant and all other items, work. It can be a little complicated for the elderly. But the features are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl McKeown

customer_reviews.title: Not quite
customer_reviews.text: Does not fully satisfy the necessary requirements for a totally blind person although advertised as such.
customer_reviews.author: Peg L

product_meta.title: VTech SN6187 CareLine Expandable Cordless Phone with Answering System and Accessory Portable Pendant, White
product_meta.description: Everyday conversations and emergency calls are just a speed-dial button away. Wear it around your neck or clipped to your waistband for the most mobility at home. No monthly monitoring fees, installation costs or contracts. Always know who’s calling, even when you’re in the other room. All devices announce the names of your callers through the speakerphones.
feature_bullets: Digital Answering System – 14 minutes of record time
